scripts.compile: cp ./package.json ./v-dist/build/package.json && cp ./auth.js ./v-dist/build/auth.js && cp ./index.js ./v-dist/build/index.js && cp -r ./app/models/system ./v-dist/build/models/system && cp -r ./app/routes ./v-dist/build/routes && cp -r ./app/modules ./v-dist/build/modules && cp -r ./libs/ ./v-dist/build &&  babel-compile -p es2015  ./v-dist/build/:v-dist/version
